thread.title: The GOP Honored Abe Lincoln’s Birthday With A Fake Quote And Launched Four Score And Seven Jokes
thread.title_full: The GOP Honored Abe Lincoln’s Birthday With A Fake Quote And Launched Four Score And Seven Jokes

author: Kimberly Ricci
title: The GOP Honored Abe Lincoln’s Birthday With A Fake Quote And Launched Four Score And Seven Jokes
text:
His leadership brought us together; his legacy inspires us still. Happy Birthday, President Lincoln! pic.twitter.com/W2rXcKHVpu 
— GOP (@GOP) February 12, 2017 

Abraham Lincoln greeted this earth on February 12, 1809. As one does, the Republican party celebrated the 208th anniversary of this momentous occasion with a tweeted tribute. Unfortunately, the quote that they chose — “And in the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years” — was not only bland in comparison to anything they could have used, but it’s also a fake quote . As always, Jake Tapper was on the case and pointed out, “There is no evidence that Abraham Lincoln ever said this.”
There is no evidence that Abraham Lincoln ever said this. https://t.co/3AHyxWDghy https://t.co/z4y5m9J45Z 
— Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) February 12, 2017 

Yeah, that’s pretty embarrassing. Folks were already having a Sunday joy fest after the Department of Education misspelled W.E.B. Du Bois’ name . Yet that was a tiny mistake in comparison to misattributing a quote to the 16th president, especially since Donald Trump and Paul Ryan take great pleasure in claiming that Republicans inhabit “the party of Lincoln.” 
Naturally, this fake quote launched a meme with some terrifically funny responses. There were definitely more than four score and seven jokes at play, but we’re not posting that many. Instead, here are some highlights — beginning with the obligatory quote from Omar in The Wire .

@GOP pic.twitter.com/59LftcZdEN 
— T. Becket Adams (@BecketAdams) February 12, 2017 
Since the @GOP is just going around making up quotes… pic.twitter.com/QCJgVlpwPu 
— Elon James White (@elonjames) February 12, 2017 
@GOP pic.twitter.com/V2V1mPY6Hn 
— Brian Klaas (@brianklaas) February 12, 2017 
. @GOP "I'm not like the other girls" -Abraham Lincoln
— Mara Wilson (@MaraWilson) February 12, 2017 
@GOP pic.twitter.com/nVUhtodwaz 
— T. Becket Adams (@BecketAdams) February 12, 2017 
@GOP "Wu Tang is for the children." -Abraham Lincoln https://t.co/vSbGqJ6Yv2 
— Wander (@WANDERAround1) February 12, 2017 


. @GOP 'You can put lipstick on a pig, but it's still a pig.'— Abraham Lincoln #AbrahamLincoln pic.twitter.com/Z4wsdL3HJT 
— Roy Steele (@thespiansfo) February 12, 2017 
"SEE YOU IN COURT!"–Abe Lincoln
— Clara Jeffery (@ClaraJeffery) February 12, 2017 
. @GOP pic.twitter.com/TKQKnu8LHB 
— jon gabriel (@exjon) February 12, 2017 
. @GOP Another great Lincoln quote. :) #DamnTheGOPisStupid pic.twitter.com/pjbXteByR2 
— KMG365 (@starbucksgirl51) February 12, 2017 

Finally, there’s a nice rick roll to tie this mess up. Good.
Fixed. @GOP pic.twitter.com/EKh1XsVB0f 
— John Holzer (@johnholzer) February 12, 2017
